participant_1.name: Tina
participant_1.personality: enthusiastic and nostalgic, loves to reminisce about childhood.
participant_1.background: my favorite toy as a child was my lite brite. i take dance lessons once a week. i also like old school hip hop. i was born in the early 80s. i love new kids on the block.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: caring and ambitious, always looking for new opportunities.
participant_2.background: my favorite movie is friday. i'm now looking for a new job. i'm a doctor. my daughter is a child prodigy. i enjoy going to the park.

content.text: Hiya! i like to dance and dance
